mapper.select: select kui.id as id, kui.username as username, kui.nickname as nickname, kui.avatar as avatar, ifnull(kca.superadmin, 'M') as superadmin from khl_club_member kcm left join khl_userinfo kui on kcm.user_id = kui.id left join khl_club_admin kca on kcm.user_id = kca.user_id where kcm.club_id = #{clubId}
